text: Laws of Attraction is a 2004 Irish-British-German romantic comedy-drama movie. It is about two high-profile divorce lawyers in New York City. It stars Julianne Moore, Pierce Brosnan and Parker Posey. The movie got bad reviews from critics when it was released, but it earned back its budget revenue. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * Category:2004 romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:Irish romance movies Category:Irish comedy movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Laws of Attraction
